revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=BeagleBoard.org |model=PocketBeagle |revision=(rev A2) |asin=B07663NS35 |price=25 |est_release_date=9/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=0.15 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Octavo Systems |cpu1_model=OSD3358 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |fla1=0 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K256M16HA-125 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (OTG), Micro SD, |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 7-pad |serial=yes,, 3-pin,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1) |eth_none=true |flags=mikroBUS }} :[https://beagleboard.org/pocket Product page]
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''Octavo Systems'' [http://octavosystems.com/octavo_products/osd335x/ OSD3358] (ARM Cortex-A8) :Processor: [[TI]] ''Sitara'' AM3358 @1GHz (ARM Cortex-A8) :NEON floating-point accelerator (ARM Cortex-M3) :2× 32-bit @200MHz programmable real-time units (PRUs) *RAM: 512MB (DDR3), 4KB I2C EEPROM for board configuration information *[[Texas Instruments]] TPS65217C PMIC, TL5209 LDO
The board can be powered from three different sources: * USB port on a PC via Female Mini-B * Power supply with a USB connector via Female Mini-B * Expansion Header pins (VIN, VIN-USB or VIN-BAT)
===See also=== :https://beagleboard.org/boards *[[BeagleBone Black]] • [https://beagleboard.org/black PPage] *[[BeagleBone Blue]] • [https://beagleboard.org/blue PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green|BeagleBone Green]] • [http://www.seeedstudio.com/wiki/Beaglebone_green PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green Wireless|BeagleBone Green WiFi]] • [https://www.seeedstudio.com/SeeedStudio-BeagleBone-Green-Wireless-p-2650.html PPage] *[[BeagleBoard X15]] • [https://beagleboard.org/x15 PPage] *[[BeagleBoard xM]] • [https://beagleboard.org/beagleboard-xm PPage] *[[BeagleBoard]] • [https://beagleboard.org/beagleboard PPage]
